Package rook.core.io.proxy

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CapsCache
    Keeps track of the Caps of all IO Services in the environment
    IOGroups
    Constants
    IOInputs
    Listens to Inputs from all IO Services
    IOListener
    Listens for BroadcastMessages on the given RID group.
    IOOutputs
    Listens to outputs from all IO Services.
    IOProxy
    Takes care of all wire-level communications to IO Services in the environment.
